scripts.test-ci: NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover --include-all-sources=true ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --recursive && codecov -F unit
scripts.eslint:
eslint --ignore-path .gitignore **/*.js && echo "  JS lint passed
"; exit 0
scripts.mdlint:
remark -qf . && echo "  Markdown lint passed
"; exit 0
scripts.lint:
eslint --ignore-path .gitignore **/*.js && remark -qf . && echo "  JS lint and markdown lint passed
"; exit 0
